Dear Radiance Community,


Please consider submitting an abstract to Building Simulation 2017- the biennial conference of the International Building Performance Simulation Association (IBPSA). The conference will be held in San Francisco from August 7-9, 2017. This is the first time it has been held in the US since 1995.


Abstracts for peer-reviewed papers are due August 10th, 2016. Oral presentations without papers will be solicited later in 2016.


IBPSA is encouraging submissions from all areas of building performance, including but not limited to: lighting, daylighting, acoustics, HVAC, CFD, controls, policy, and BIM. More information about the conference can be found on http://www.buildingsimulation2017.org/


Many Thanks!
